page.title: 06FARMING IN THE LOCAL AREA
page.content: With the local area being mainly an urbanised area with a damp climate the local farmers concentrate on dairy farming.The farms are mixed with crops and dairy cattle.The crops are almost entirely grass crops such a hay , silage and pasture grass. This years hay crop was very poor because of the very wet summer. The two main types of dairy cattle are Friesian and Ayrshire There are also a few market gardens within our area.These nurseries are usually under glass and provide vegtables,salad crops and cut flowers. Other uses of the land which is not built-up include: Woodland (usually found along the river valleys), and rough grassland
